{{DISPLAYTITLE:List of ''Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation'' episodes (series 1)}} {{Infobox television season |season_name = {{nowrap|Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation}}
Series 1 |bgcolour = #0095B6 |fgcolour = #FFFFFF |image = |caption = |show_name = Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation |country = [[Australia]] |num_episodes = 18 |network = [[Network Ten]] |first_aired = {{Start date|2009|5|5|df=yes}} |last_aired = {{End date|2009|11|22|df=yes}} |next_series = [[List of Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation episodes (series 2)|Series 2]] }} The first series of [[Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation]] began airing on the 5th of May, 2009. It ran for 18 episodes concluding with a Christmas special on the 22nd of November 2009. {{Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation Summary}} ==Series 1== {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" Airdate = 18 August 2009 | B = [[Jimmy Barnes]] | X = [[Dr. Chris Brown]] | Y = [[Nova 100|Hayley Pearson]] | EndGame = Packing a car for a holiday | Winner = Generation Y | Viewers = The ''Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation'' trophy }} {{TAYG episode | Episode = 17 | Airdate = 1 September 2009{{ref|2|[b]}} | B = [[Kerri-Anne Kennerley]] | X = [[Wil Anderson]] | Y = [[Josh Lawson]] | EndGame = Building a snowman | Winner = Generation X | Viewers = The ''Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation'' trophy and a cheque for $7.50 }} {{TAYG episode | Episode = 18 | Airdate = 22 November 2009{{ref|3|[c]}} | B = [[Denise Scott]] | X = [[Dylan Lewis]] | Y = [[Ruby Rose]] | EndGame = Decorating a Christmas tree | Winner = Generation Y | Viewers = No prize }} |} ==Notes== {{refbegin}} a. {{note|1}}From episode 12 onwards a small trophy with a plaque saying "Winner: Trivia Competition" replaced the different prizes that were awarded in each episode. A new trophy parodying the [[Raising the Flag on Iwo Jima]] was used starting from the first episode of the second series. b. {{note|2}}The series finale featured the contestants and the host dressed up in costume as people related to their generation era. Shaun dressed as [[Robert Smith (musician)|Robert Smith]], Amanda as [[Marilyn Monroe]], Kerri-Anne as [[Krystle Carrington]], Charlie as [[Marty McFly]], Wil as [[Emmett Brown|"Doc" Emmett Brown]], Josh Thomas as [[Gerard Way]] and Josh Lawson as [[Harry Potter (character)|Harry Potter]]. c. {{note|3}}This episode was a Christmas Special, with Christmas-themed questions. An extended version was aired on Christmas Eve, December 24, 2009. {{refend}} ==References== {{reflist|2}} {{Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation 1}} [[Category:2009 television seasons]] [[Category:Lists of Australian television series episodes]] [[Category:Talkin' 'Bout Your Generation|List of episodes (Series 1)]]
